CoinControl.coincontrol_couldnt_find_coin_locally_in: Couldn't find an installation of this coin
CoinControl.coincontrol_it_seems_you_dont_have_p1: It appears you don't have an installation of this coin's wallet on your computer. If you believe this is an error, please make sure the following steps are complete:
CoinControl.coincontrol_it_seems_you_dont_have_check: The coin's wallet is properly installed.
The wallet is running on your machine, and the wallet is synced to its network.
The wallet has the proper RPC settings in its configuration file.
If the above steps are complete, then BarterDEX may simply need to be refreshed. Please log out of BarterDEX, log in again, and reactivate your coin.
CoinControl.coincontrol_it_seems_you_dont_have_p2: If this does not resolve the issue, please reach out to our support team.

login.login_genpass_repeat_the_pass_here_place: Repeat the passphrase here, as shown in the first input field.
login.login_genpass_click_on_regen_button: Click the "Regen" button to generate a new passphrase.
login.login_genpass_make_sure_to_save_new_pass:
Save this new passphrase in a secure location.
To confirm that you have saved it, please type the passphrase in the "Verify Passphrase" field.
login.login_genpass_login_with_new_pass: Log in with your new passphrase.

Portfolio.portfolio_set_goal_percentage_for_your_p: Set percentage goal for your portfolio
Portfolio.portfolio_auto_goal_all_text:
Are you sure you want to enable the Auto Goal feature for all active and enabled coins?
This will reset all existing goals and you will have to set each individual coin's goal again. Please click Yes to proceed, or hit No to cancel.
Portfolio.portfolio_set_auto_goal_executed: Auto Goal executed for all active coins. Make sure you enable Auto Price for each coin.
Portfolio.portfolio_receive_address_dialog_01: If you are sending a transaction to your BarterDEX smartaddress,
Portfolio.portfolio_receive_address_dialog_02: please send three (3) small transactions, instead of one (1) large transaction.
Portfolio.portfolio_receive_address_dialog_03: This facilitates an optimal BarterDEX experience.
Portfolio.portfolio_send_subtract_txfee: Auto subtract transaction fees from amount?
Portfolio.portfolio_tx_did_not_complete: Transaction did not complete. Please try again.

Exchange.exchange_coin_is_disabled_enable_before_:
Coin is disabled.
Please enable before trading.
Exchange.exchange_0conf_settings_text_one: Speed Mode removes the need to wait for blockchain confirmations. Trades complete within seconds when this feature is activated.
Exchange.exchange_toastr_order_is_too_small: Order is too small. Please try again with a larger order.
Exchange.exchange_portfolio_auto_buy_margin_will_: The Auto Buy Margin tool will automatically buy orders on lower prices, based on your specified percentage.
Exchange.exchange_portfolio_auto_buy_on_fixed_pri: The Auto Buy on Fixed Price tool will automatically buy orders that meet the requirements of your specified price.
Exchange.exchange_portfolio_auto_sell_margin_will: The Auto Sell Margin tool will automatically sell on higher prices, based on your specified percentage.
Exchange.exchange_portfolio_auto_sell_on_fixed_pr: The Auto Sell on Fixed Price tool will automatically sell based on your specified price.
Exchange.exchange_manual_auto_repeat_buy_order_ex: An Auto-Repeat Buy order executed at the fixed price of
Exchange.exchange_autorepat_buy_order_executed_at: An Auto-Repeat Buy order executed with a margin percent at
Exchange.exchange_autorepeat_auto_adjust_based_on: Buy-order prices will automatically adjust based on coinmarketcap.com prices.
Exchange.exchange_manual_auto_repeat_sell_order_e: An Auto Repeat Sell Order executed at a fixed price of
Exchange.exchange_autorepat_sell_order_executed_a: An Auto Repeat Sell Order executed with a margin percent at
Exchange.exchange_autorepeat_auto_adjust_based_on: Sell-order prices will automatically adjust based on coinmarketcap.com prices.
Exchange.exchange_utxo_dialog_looks_like_you_dont: Looks like you don't have enough UTXOs in your balance.
BarterDEX has resolved the issue by making the required UTXOs for you.
If you see this message, "Executed Auto Split Funds", please wait for approx. 30 to 60 seconds before trying again.

As a result of BarterDEX's UTXO management, you may see outgoing transactions at your smartaddress. This is normal. BarterDEX is temporarily sending your funds to the network for processing. Once your funds are transformed into the proper inventory sizes, the funds will reappear in your account.
Please wait a few moments and try again.
If you still receive the same error, here are few more options to consider:
Try clicking the "Inventory" button, found near the coin's balance.
This will take you to an educational overview on "UTXOs," and provide more suggestions for fixing the error.
Try purchasing a lower total amount.
Log out of BarterDEX, log back in again, and try lowering your total purchase amount.
Exchange.exchange_depositonerror_required_trade_i: It appears that your trade request exceeds your total balance. To complete this trade, please send the following amount to the displayed address.
Exchange.exchange_depositonerror_want_to_make_a_r: Would you like to make a relevant deposit and try again?
Exchange.exchange_depositonerror_system_did_not_f: BarterDEX did not find a matching UTXO deposit in your inventory.
Exchange.exchange_precheck_btc_tx_fee_too_high_10: Bitcoin transaction fee is too high

Due to an excessive Bitcoin transaction fee, BarterDEX is stopping the order. Were BarterDEX to continue, the excessive fee can negatively impact the order's completion. Please try again when the Bitcoin transaction fee is lower.
Exchange.exchange_precheck_btc_tx_high_50k_02: We do not recommended placing orders when excessive fees are present. They can can delay your transaction confirmations, and this may affect the completion of your order. Are you sure you want to continue?
Exchange.exchange_precheck_btc_tx_fee_seems_ok: The BTC transaction fee is within safe limits. Proceeding with trade.
Exchange.exchange_botbuysell_executed_auto_split_: Executed Auto Split Funds. Please try again in approx. 30 seconds.
Exchange.exchange_botbuysell_no_withdraw_info_fou: No withdrawal info found. Please try again with a lower amount.
Exchange.exchange_botstatus_dialog_change_this_au: Change Settings for this Auto Trade
Exchange.exchange_swapstatus_state_seller_sent_pa: Seller sent Payment. Waiting for Buyer to confirm Payment...
Exchange.exchange_swapstatus_state_buyer_payment_: Buyer sent Payment. Waiting for Seller's Payment.
Exchange.exchange_swapstatus_state_seller_deposit: Seller completed Security Deposit. Waiting for Buyer's Payment.

TradeHistory.tradehistory_no_trade_history: No trade history, or swap(s) are still in progress

ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_please_confirm_you_want_to_send: Please confirm you want to send and lock
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_p_01: Use of this feature requires a security deposit, equal to or greater than the amount you wish to actively trade. This deposit is placed in a special multisig address for safe keeping. The following conditions apply
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_li_01: The minimum deposit amount is 10 KMD.
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_li_02: The minimum deposit period is 1 week, and the maximum period is 52 weeks.
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_li_03: The expiration date is permanently set and recorded within your blockchain transaction at the time of sending the deposit.
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_li_04: Choose your time period appropriately, as you can only reclaim your deposit after the expiration date.
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_li_05: Your KMD security deposit will continue to accrue the 5% APR throughout the time period, as usual.
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_li_06: Upon conclusion, you will receive your deposit and interest, less a security fee of 0.1%.
ZeroConfirmation.zeroconf_info_dialog_p_02: IMPORTANT: If you attempt to cheat while using Speed Mode, both the amount of your offense and an additional penalty fee can be deducted from your deposit and forfeited to the affected parties. The remaining amount in your deposit will be claimable at the normal time of expiration.

Settings.settings_charts_desc: Trading charts settings update will take affect next time you get back to Exchange screen. (Doesn't require app restart)
